mapper.insert: insert into board ( title, content, memberNum, date, category, startDate) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{memberNum},now(),#{category},#{startDate})
mapper.select:
SELECT b.boardNum,b.startDate,b.title,b.date, b.category, m.loginId, m.memberNum FROM board b, member m where b.memberNum=m.memberNum
and b.category ='recruit' order by boardNum desc
and b.category='apply' order by boardNum desc
order by boardNum desc
mapper.update: update board set title =#{title},content =#{content}, date = NOW(), category=#{category}, startDate={startDate} where boardNum=#{boardNum}
